General.Name: Dongsin Engineering & Construction
General.Description: Dongsin Engineering & Construction Co., Ltd. operates in the construction business in South Korea. It is involved in the construction of civil engineering, electrical, landscaping, and firefighting equipment works; housing construction business; design and construction of general waste treatment facilities, manure purification tank, and excretion treatment facilities; and offers cultural property repair and real estate rental, as well as wholesale and retail; and facility maintenance business. The company was formerly known as Sampoong Construction Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Dongsin Engineering & Construction Co., Ltd. in June 1998. Dongsin Engineering & Construction Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Andong, South Korea.

1.Name: Dong-Han  Kim
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, VP and Representative Director
